name: reoffend
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of someone who has previously committed a crime) to commit another crime: Most prisoners reoffend following release from prison. The younger you are when you commit a crime, the more likely you are to re-offend.
More examplesFewer examplesExperts say most sex offenders rarely reoffend.Sending a juvenile to prison increases the odds he'll re-offend within a year of release by 35%.Building more prisons will result in a huge rise in the proportion of criminals who reoffend, a criminology expert has said.
